originalText.text: I came here with my four cousins and we had so much fun! The whole experience was fantastic from beginning to end, all of the staff was so helpful and we didnâ€™t have to wait too long for our room. We did the psychedelic mansion game and it was interactive and although it was a little hard to get the hang of it, it ended up being so so much fun! And we even got the #1 spot in the lower east side location!

originalText.text: We did our quarterly team event here. It was super fun and quite challenging. The only con was there was a one stage in the Squid Games challenge that our team felt wasn't clear. We wasted a lot of time in the beginning of the stage, where if the instructions were a little clearer, we probably would have had a higher score. Other then that, overall great experience and the end gif group picture was a great gift! Our team is already discussing doing our future team events at Immersive Gamebox. I'm also thinking of going to the other locations in NJ. Thank you for a great time!
